tool.name: S of Q Omega Simulator
tool.command: #import re #from pathlib import Path #set $sif_name = "dca_cpu_0_1_0.sif" #set $sif_image = "summit-singularity-cpu:0.1.0" mkdir -p portal/g4_bins.bp portal/sofqomega0.bp && cp $input portal/input_file.json && #for $el in $input_bins: #set $cleaned_name = re.sub('[^\w\-\.\s]', '_', str($el.element_identifier)) #if Path($cleaned_name).suffix == '': #set $cleaned_name=$cleaned_name + '.'+$el.ext #end if cp -P '$el' 'portal/g4_bins.bp/${cleaned_name}' && #end for module purge && module load DefApps && module load gcc/9.1.0 && source /gpfs/alpine/stf007/world-shared/containers/utils/requiredmpilibs.source && ( [ -e \${GALAXY_CONTAINERS_DIR}/$sif_name ] || singularity pull --disable-cache --dir \${GALAXY_CONTAINERS_DIR} $sif_name oras://code.ornl.gov:4567/ndip/tool-sources/dca/dca-main/$sif_image ) && cp $input portal/input_file.json && \${GALAXY_COMMAND_PREFIX} singularity exec --bind \$(pwd)/portal:/portal --bind \$PERSISTENT_STORAGE_DIR:\$PERSISTENT_STORAGE_DIR --pwd /portal \${GALAXY_CONTAINERS_DIR}/$sif_name /dca/chi_q_omega /portal/input_file.json > >(tee -a $output) 2> >(tee -a $output >&2) && #set $storage_folder=os.path.join(str($experiment_name),str($output.hid)+"_"+str($output.history_id)+"_sofqomega0.bp") STORAGE_FOLDER=\$PERSISTENT_STORAGE_DIR/$storage_folder && mkdir -p \$STORAGE_FOLDER && mv portal/sofqomega0.bp/* \$STORAGE_FOLDER && ln -s \$STORAGE_FOLDER/* portal/sofqomega0.bp
tool.help: A tool to run s of q omega simulations
